LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.label: Half Elves
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.description: Half-elves are a race that combines the traits of humans and elves using Glitterworld technology. \nThis race, which lives on a remote planet that cannot exist in the first place, is thought to have been illegally traded among the cosmonauts, and then crash-landed on a remote planet due to spacecraft trouble. It is \nIt has excellent general abilities such as shooting, hunting, farming, and cooking, and has high survival ability, but is closed and has a considerable lack of sense of machinery.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.3.label: head
